content.question: If <math alttext="f of x, equals, the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, x minus 1, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, and denominator the absolute value of, x minus 1, end absolute value, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, then the value of <math alttext="the integral from, negative 1 to 3, of, f of x, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> is
